attributes.action: To urge the government to provide free Hgv parking at services for our safety
attributes.background: We urge the government to provide free parking for Hgv vehicles. Our lives and our loads are being put at risk parking in lay-bys. Services charge £30 to park for the night with awful food and awful dirty showers. This is costly to us as most companies don't reimburse us. We simply can't afford it
